page.title: 16Facilities Bilbrough Colton
page.content: The facilities in the 2 villages are similar.They both have a public house. In Bilbrough it is the Three Hares and in Colton it is the Sun Inn.Unlike Bilbrough Colton does not have a school.They each have a church built in the reign of Queen Victoria.Neither have many services today.There are 3 tennis courts in Bilbrough, and many functions organised by the school.For other facilities both communities have to go to York or Tadcaster.For sports and swimming; for dentists, doctors, opticians and hospital treatment York is the nearest.There are 2 garages on the A64 for petrol and repairs _ one at Colton Lane End and one more distant near the Wild Man Inn.For the nearest theatre or cinema they have to travel to York by car.Colton has its own post office, but Bilbrough residents have to go toYork by car/bus
